pyCNN-LSTM¶

pyCNN-LSTM is a Python library that contains a wide range of models for working with time-series data using hybrid deep learning models that uses both a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN). The use of these models allow both to capture the spatial features and the time dependencies between timesteps.

This library contains the implementation of 22 architectures both in Tensorflow+Keras and PyTorch.

Installation¶

To install pyCNN-LSTM, we recommend using pip.

pip install pyCNN-LSTM
